title: What's next after Supreme Court approves pro-Trump Texas map for 2026?
shortDescription: Not since the 1800s have so many states tried to redraw U.S. House district boundaries without a new Census.

title: Trump approval rating falls amid worry over nation's economy
shortDescription: The president’s approval rating fell to 42% while his disapproval rating rose. A greater share of respondents disapproved of Trump’s handling of the economy.

title: Sen. Bernie Moreno introduces bill to end dual citizenship in US
shortDescription: Sen. Bernie Moreno of Ohio has introduced the "Exclusive Citizenship Act of 2025," which would require U.S. citizens to hold only U.S. citizenship.

title: Trump awarded the FIFA Peace Prize. Will he get the Nobel in 2026?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump was awarded the first ever FIFA Peace Prize on Dec. 5. It comes after he didn't win the Nobel, but he has been nominated.

title: Indiana House passes Trump-requested mid-decade redistricting bill
shortDescription: Indiana's mid-decade redistricting proposal cleared the House and now heads to the Senate, where it faces an uncertain future.

title: Trump awarded 'FIFA Peace Prize'
shortDescription: FIFA awarded President Donald Trump the inaugural "Peace Prize" award.

title: Supreme Court to take on controversial Trump immigration policy
shortDescription: The Supreme Court will review Trump's claim that not all children born in the United States are entitled to citizenship.

title: Supreme Court ruling could impact 2026 midterms
shortDescription: The Supreme Court ruled that Texas can use a congressional map drawn to give Republicans an advantage, with other states now following suit.

title: Trump arrives ahead of inaugural FIFA peace prize
shortDescription: "I don't need prizes. I need to save lives." President Donald Trump spoke to reporters when he arrived ahead of FIFA's World Cup draw.

title: Trump wins inaugural FIFA peace prize
shortDescription: President Donald Trump didn't win the Nobel but he was awarded a newly-invented FIFA peace prize during the draw for the 2026 World Cup.

title: What 8 wars did Donald Trump say he has ended? See the list.
shortDescription: Donald Trump says he has ended eight wars since he took office in January 2025. But the US has only been involved in 6 peace agreements or ceasefires.

title: FIFA shoots for a Goooal! in Trump World Cup courtship
shortDescription: The president of FIFA, Gianni Infantino, has become a Trump favorite appearing at major diplomatic and White House events ahead of the 2026 World Cup.

title: Ex-Prince Andrew and President Trump were once close associates
shortDescription: Ex-Prince Andrew was photographed with Epstein at Trump’s Mar-a-Lago in February of 2000. Could Andrew’s ultimate fall from grace impact Trump?

title: Trump watches: Does the president sell gold watches advertised on TV?
shortDescription: Commercials advertising Trump watches continue to run on networks like NewsMax, offering timepieces with the president's signature starting at $499.

title: White House ballroom project gets new design lead
shortDescription: The White House ballroom plans are moving forward under new architectural guidance after disputes over the project's size.

title: Will Trump finally win global peace prize? Watch FIFA draw to find out.
shortDescription: International soccer's governing body will announce the recipient of its first ever FIFA Peace Prize at the World Cup draw in Washington, DC.
